  • Element
org.everit.osgi.ecm.annotation

Annotation Type Component


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface Component
    The class is an ECM Component.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String componentId
      Defines the Component id.
      String configurationPid
      The configuration pid.
      ConfigurationPolicy configurationPolicy
      If true configuration is required to activate the component otherwise if there is no configuration, the component will be activated anyway.
      String description
      This is generally used as a description for the object described by the meta type.
      Icon[] icons
      One or more icon that should be shown for the component on a management screen.
      String label
      This is generally used as a title for the object described by the meta type.
      String localizationBase
      The base name of the place of the localized texts.
      boolean metatype
      If true, MetatypeProvider OSGi service will be registered for the component.
      String version
      Version of the component.

    • Element Detail

      • componentId

        public abstract String componentId
        Defines the Component id. Default value: Fully qualified name of the Java class.
        Default:
        ""

      • configurationPid

        public abstract String configurationPid
        The configuration pid. The default value for this is the name of the component.
        Default:
        ""

      • configurationPolicy

        public abstract ConfigurationPolicy configurationPolicy
        If true configuration is required to activate the component otherwise if there is no configuration, the component will be activated anyway.
        Default:
        org.everit.osgi.ecm.annotation.ConfigurationPolicy.OPTIONAL

      • description

        public abstract String description
        This is generally used as a description for the object described by the meta type. This name may be localized by prepending a % sign to the name. Default value: %<name>.description
        Default:
        ""

      • icons

        public abstract Icon[] icons
        One or more icon that should be shown for the component on a management screen.
        Default:
        {}

      • label

        public abstract String label
        This is generally used as a title for the object described by the meta type. This name may be localized by prepending a % sign to the name. Default value: %<name>.name
        Default:
        ""

      • localizationBase

        public abstract String localizationBase
        The base name of the place of the localized texts.
        Default:
        "OSGI-INF/metatype/metatype"

      • metatype

        public abstract boolean metatype
        If true, MetatypeProvider OSGi service will be registered for the component.
        Default:
        true

      • version

        public abstract String version
        Version of the component. If not specified, the version of the component will be the bundle that holds the component.
        Default:
        ""
